name: 拉法埃拉·蕾娅
name_full: 拉法埃拉·蕾娅 Raffaella Rea

last_movies.title: 一千零一夜：阿拉丁和天方夜谭

introduction: Born in Naples, Raffaella lives with her family in Pomigliano d'Arco, where she completed his studies in 2000 before moving to Rome to attend the National Academy of Dramatic Art Silvio D'Amico, where she graduated in 2003.She works in theater, film and especially on television, rising to prominence with the television series Tell Me (2006), directed by Tiziana Aristarchus Donna and Richard, and the TV miniseries Scratch a tiger (2007), directed by Alfredo Peyretti, in which she stars with the role of Rose, along with Sergio Assisi and Gabriella Pession.These TV dramas are followed, among others: Commissioner De Luca, directed by Antonio Frazzi, Tell Me - Chapter II, Wings, directed by Andrea Cardinals TV film on the history of Gianfranco Paglia, captain of the Lightning, on a mission Somalia in 1993, during an ambush, lost use of legs, and Bread and Freedom, directed by Alberto Negrin, mini-series dedicated to the trade unionist Giuseppe Di Vittorio.Her first feature films are: The never-ending story (2004), directed by Carlo Mazzacurati, and Tris women & bridal gowns (2009), directed by Vincenzo Terracciano
